title: @sriyan
author: @sriyan
content: What are the cosmos based projects with no token? I am targeting the 2024. Do you have any list/document to share?

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I don't, but if there is going to be airdrop for cosmos/ibc ecosystem, atom stakers and osmosis stakers are sure to be included in it, so you could stake some in both and also lp on osmosis in popular pools such as osmo/atom. That should give you good chances. I also use this sources to keep track of cosmos airdrops: 1) https://airdrop.glideapp.io/dl/d0a5f42) https://cosmosairdrops.io/claimable3) https://kddit.kalli.st/r/cosmosairdrops

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on November 25, 2023, 12:04:44 AMI don't, but if there is going to be airdrop for cosmos/ibc ecosystem, atom stakers and osmosis stakers are sure to be included in it, so you could stake some in both and also lp on osmosis in popular pools such as osmo/atom. That should give you good chances. I also use this sources to keep track of cosmos airdrops: 1) https://airdrop.glideapp.io/dl/d0a5f42) https://cosmosairdrops.io/claimable3) https://kddit.kalli.st/r/cosmosairdropsI found another site to check this. 1. https://cosmospug.com/

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: @sriyan on November 26, 2023, 05:46:58 AMQuote from: libert19 on November 25, 2023, 12:04:44 AM~I found another site to check this. 1. https://cosmospug.com/It has stop updating, you can compare cosmospug with glideapp there have been new airdrops that haven't got updated on cosmospug, their Twitter has no updates either, last tweet was in feb.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on November 26, 2023, 06:13:58 AMQuote from: @sriyan on November 26, 2023, 05:46:58 AMQuote from: libert19 on November 25, 2023, 12:04:44 AM~I found another site to check this. 1. https://cosmospug.com/It has stop updating, you can compare cosmospug with glideapp there have been new airdrops that haven't got updated on cosmospug, their Twitter has no updates either, last tweet was in feb. Did you know about any non projects(Snap not announced ones) to participate now?

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: @sriyan on November 27, 2023, 04:02:30 PMQuote from: libert19 on November 26, 2023, 06:13:58 AM~Did you know about any non projects(Snap not announced ones) to participate now?I dunno if these have taken snapshots already but Lamina1 and Timeswap are likely to do retrospective airdrop. Also, this guy I came across few days ago on X posts solana stuff, from gambles of his listâ€” FluxB, Jupiter, Jito have announced airdrop: https://twitter.com/MetisCharter/Fun fact: he posted solana guide on nov 2, and in there we were to use Jupiter, meanwhile Jupiter snapshot was also taken on nov 2.

comments.author: huu78
comments.body: I don't think the Cosmos project is as interesting as Solana at the moment.I see Solana is more in demand now.Many airdrops are popping up on the Solana network.but maybe next year the cosmos network will be in great demand, who knows.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: huu78 on November 29, 2023, 01:29:43 PMI don't think the Cosmos project is as interesting as Solana at the moment.I see Solana is more in demand now.Many airdrops are popping up on the Solana network.but maybe next year the cosmos network will be in great demand, who knows.Cosmos have gotten plenty airdrops, but their amount usually tends to be worth peanuts so ecosystem hasn't come under limelight as much as Ethereum and others.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: It seems you can use DefiLlama here. But right now I checked their Airdrop page and filtered it with the CosmosHub network, unfortunately, there's no platform for the expected airdrop.Second, you can try it to check all defi platforms filtered with Cosmos network and you will get the list of platforms and find some prospects.

comments.author: slashz9
comments.body: As far as I know, when looking for airdrops and bounties, I rarely and almost never find them on the Cosmos network, I don't know whether the ecosystem there is bad or unpopular, or there are other obstacles that make new projects reluctant to use the Cosmos network.But what we see is that Cosmos appears to continue to develop, although there is little information about airdrops, unlike the Solana and Ethereum ecosystems.

comments.author: cryptoknightt
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on November 30, 2023, 12:35:30 AMQuote from: huu78 on November 29, 2023, 01:29:43 PMI don't think the Cosmos project is as interesting as Solana at the moment.I see Solana is more in demand now.Many airdrops are popping up on the Solana network.but maybe next year the cosmos network will be in great demand, who knows.Cosmos have gotten plenty airdrops, but their amount usually tends to be worth peanuts so ecosystem hasn't come under limelight as much as Ethereum and others. Well, that's what makes them unpopular, maybe the developer can consider that, and provide input for the future as a large and good community will become one of the projects that becomes big and survives.

comments.author: Sophokles
comments.body: If you are a fan of ATOM then you can speculate on cosmos project because if there is any airdrop in their ecosystem, one of the requirements should be for atom holders. To be honest the rewards the community gets from a project that is built on a L2 aren't that significant. There were some airdrop in the ZKsync project that weren't that valuable in terms of value. So i am not sure how profitable that will be for the cosmos but if the requirement is only to hold or stake atom then you can do that if you are a atom holder.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: Sophokles on December 01, 2023, 09:42:33 PMIf you are a fan of ATOM then you can speculate on cosmos project because if there is any airdrop in their ecosystem, one of the requirements should be for atom holders. To be honest the rewards the community gets from a project that is built on a L2 aren't that significant. There were some airdrop in the ZKsync project that weren't that valuable in terms of value. So i am not sure how profitable that will be for the cosmos but if the requirement is only to hold or stake atom then you can do that if you are a atom holder.Cosmos is layer 0 blockchain, but yea you are right about staking $atom, I already mentioned about it in first comment above, it should make you eligible for most of airdrops centered around cosmos.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Stride airdrop has been going on from long time, you can check your eligibility here by connecting your wallet: https://app.stride.zone/airdropFor some it may be so small that it may be not even worth to click button

comments.author: huu78
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on November 30, 2023, 12:35:30 AMQuote from: huu78 on November 29, 2023, 01:29:43 PMI don't think the Cosmos project is as interesting as Solana at the moment.I see Solana is more in demand now.Many airdrops are popping up on the Solana network.but maybe next year the cosmos network will be in great demand, who knows.Cosmos have gotten plenty airdrops, but their amount usually tends to be worth peanuts so ecosystem hasn't come under limelight as much as Ethereum and others. If that's the case, it looks like they need to follow existing projects on ETH and other popular networks.we have to observe what competitors are doing.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: huu78 on December 06, 2023, 02:40:26 PMQuote from: libert19 on November 30, 2023, 12:35:30 AMQuote from: huu78 on November 29, 2023, 01:29:43 PMI don't think the Cosmos project is as interesting as Solana at the moment.I see Solana is more in demand now.Many airdrops are popping up on the Solana network.but maybe next year the cosmos network will be in great demand, who knows.Cosmos have gotten plenty airdrops, but their amount usually tends to be worth peanuts so ecosystem hasn't come under limelight as much as Ethereum and others. If that's the case, it looks like they need to follow existing projects on ETH and other popular networks.we have to observe what competitors are doing.It's not like ethereum itself does airdrop, it's individual project's will. But yeah, they could strategize to bring more projects to their platform.
